price: 20. Dan Kami kuatkan kerajaannya dan Kami berikan kepadanya hikmah*(750) dan kebijaksanaan dalam menyelesaikan perselisihan.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ
footnotes: *750). Kenabian, kesempurnaan ilmu, dan ketelitian amal perbuatan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
